home.title: PNG Converter
home.subtitle: Convert images and PDFs easily
home.imageConverterDesc: Convert between JPG, PNG, WebP and other image formats

imageConverter.title: Image Converter
imageConverter.uploadText: Drag and drop images here or click to upload
imageConverter.supportedFormats: Supported formats: JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP
imageConverter.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

pdfConverter.title: PDF Converter
pdfConverter.uploadText: Drag and drop PDF files here or click to upload
pdfConverter.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

questions.a1: We support JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, and BMP formats.
questions.q2: What quality can I expect from PDF conversion?
questions.a2: High-quality conversion maintains the same quality as the original.
questions.q3: Is there a file size limit?
questions.a3: You can upload files up to 50MB.
questions.a4: Uploaded files are deleted immediately after conversion and are not stored on our servers.
questions.q5: Can I use this on mobile devices?
questions.a5: Yes, it works on all devices.

sections.intro: PNG Converter values your privacy and data protection.
sections.dataCollection: Data collected: Only uploaded files are temporarily processed.
sections.dataUsage: Data usage: Used solely for file conversion purposes.
sections.dataRetention: Data retention: Files are deleted immediately after conversion.
sections.dataSecurity: Data security: Processed securely through SSL encryption.

sections.intro: Terms of service for PNG Converter.
sections.usage: Service usage: Free to use for personal and commercial purposes.
sections.prohibited: Prohibited: Converting illegal content is not allowed.
sections.liability: Liability: We are not responsible for damages from service usage.
sections.changes: Changes: Terms may be updated with prior notice.
